channel.title: Whonix backup script suggestion
channel.description:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/WhonixBackupScript The instructions begin with the user creating a file: "~/whonix_backup" and turn that into the executable backup script. The script then tries to "mkdir ~/whonix_backup" which fails because a file is named that already. You should rename the script.
Please run the Whonix backup script every now and then. Check if the Whonix backup script changed every now and then. [code]kwrite ~/whonix_backup[/code] Paste the following content. [code]#!/bin/bash set -x sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install git git-mediawiki github-backup mkdir --parents ~/whonix_backup/adrelanos[/code]
Edit: I submitted a change to the wiki.

item.title: Whonix backup script suggestion
item.dc:creator: qubenix
item.description:
Whonix

WhonixBackupScript

Create a backup of Website and Source Code of the Whonix Anonymous Operating System.

The instructions begin with the user creating a file: “~/whonix_backup” and turn that into the executable backup script. The script then tries to “mkdir ~/whonix_backup” which fails because a file is named that already. You should rename the script.

Please run the Whonix backup script every now and then. Check if the Whonix backup script changed every now and then.

Paste the following content.

[code]#!/bin/bash

set -x

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install git git-mediawiki github-backup

mkdir --parents ~/whonix_backup/adrelanos[/code]

Edit: I submitted a change to the wiki.

Read full topic
